Package curam.util.workflow.impl

Contains the classes and utilities which provide support for application developers to define and run workflows.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
LocalizableStringResolver.NotificationStringResolver The localizable string resolver for notification related text.
LocalizableStringResolver.TaskStringResolver The localizable string resolver for task related text.
NotificationDelivery The NotificationDelivery callback interface must be implemented in the application to define how notifications should be delivered.
TaskAssignmentChecker The TaskAssignmentChecker callback interface is implemented in the application to define what should happen when a task has not been allocated to any user or work queue after the work resolver has been called for that task.
WorkResolver The WorkResolver interface contains methods to allocate a task.
 

Class Summary
BusinessObjectAssociationAdmin The BizObjAssociation entity stores details of associations between tasks and other rows on other database table.
BusinessObjectAssociationSearch A business object association represents an association between a task and a row on a database table.
DeadlineScanner This class scans for workflow deadlines and invokes the associated handler function to process them.
EnactmentService Provides facilities for application code to enact workflows.
LocalizableStringResolver This class provides routines that resolve and return the various localizable strings that exist in a workflow process definition for the locale of the current user.
TaskAdmin The Task entity stores details of a set of instructions to enable a user to perform the manual work required by an activity in a workflow.
TaskAllocationAdmin This class allows application code to request that the specified task be reallocated.
TaskHistoryAdmin The TaskHistory entity stores details of the lifecycle events that occur for a Task.
TaskListSize<T> This class is used by methods wishing to limit the size of the task search results.
WDOSnapshotOverflow This class allows application or infrastructure code to add WDO snapshot overflow data relating to tasks to the existing task WDO snapshot.
WorkflowAuditAdmin WorkflowAuditAdmin is an API for examining the workflow data object attribute values associated with the audit information for a workflow process instance.
WorkflowDeadlineAdmin The WorkflowDeadline entity stores details of the length of time that a Task or EventWait is allowed to remain unprocessed.
 

Package curam.util.workflow.impl Description

Contains the classes and utilities which provide support for application developers to define and run workflows.

See the Curam Workflow Management System Guide for more information.

Since:
Curam SDEJ3.0.0
